heading: HR00013
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS (DFA) AND DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT (DOLE) TO CREATE A JOINT CRISIS MANAGEMENT TEAM TO ASSIST THOUSANDS OF LAID OFF FILIPINO WORKERS IN THE MIDDLE EAST PARTICULARLY IN THE KINGDOM OF SAUDI ARABIA
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00013
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS (DFA) AND DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT (DOLE) TO CREATE A JOINT CRISIS MANAGEMENT TEAM TO ASSIST THOUSANDS OF LAID OFF FILIPINO WORKERS IN THE MIDDLE EAST PARTICULARLY IN THE KINGDOM OF SAUDI ARABIA
